Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.9.5-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.9.5-7. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package packer is earlier than 1.9.5-7, affected by CVE-2024-45338
